overview: This story takes place in turn-of-the-century Germany at the Naval training school. 13 fiesty recruits train each others bodies with their personal submarines and torpedoes. The dapper Seamen unload oceans of Semen in 5 hearty sex scenes. Watch them do it in the showers, in the bunk room and after exercise. Kristian Jensen is one of the instructors and he certainly teaches one of the cadets the proper way to handle his hot hard cock up the butt.
title: Internat Anno 1900 1
